definition: Poland/Polish/abbr. for 波蘭|波兰[Bo1 lan2]
Belgium/Belgian/abbr. for 比利時|比利时[Bi3 li4 shi2]
to compare/(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}/ratio/to gesture/(Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)

sentences.english: We now know that X-ray waves are 2,000 to 10,000 times shorter than light waves.
sentences.chinese: 我们现在知道X光波比光波短二千到一万倍。

sentences.english: The method can be used for measuring the voltage standing-wave ratio and tuning match of the microwave signal source quickly.
sentences.chinese: 还可快速测量微波源的驻波比和实现对它的匹配。

sentences.english: Bobby and his wife, Evelyn , are going to have a baby soon.
sentences.chinese: 波比和他的妻子伊芙琳就要生孩子了。

sentences.english: It is not clear why some people make more spindles than others.
sentences.chinese: 目前还不清楚为什么有些人产生的纺锤波比其他人多。

sentences.english: Application: Suitable for railway, VSWR at good performance, RFID system, closed processing, anti-water ability.
sentences.chinese: 驻波比性能好，封闭式处理，防水防腐能力强。

sentences.english: Billy and Bobby were small boys.
sentences.chinese: 比利和波比都是小孩子。

sentences.english: The third day, Bear Bobbi had come to the Kabula Star by UFO to pick up the children.
sentences.chinese: 第三天，波比熊乘坐飞船来到了卡布拉星接回孩子们。

sentences.english: Little Bo-Peep has lost her sheep.
Mummy, he said, Bobby's broken 3 a window in Mrs. Allen's house.
sentences.chinese: 妈妈，他说，波比打碎了艾伦太太家的窗玻璃。

sentences.english: Mummy, he said, Bobby's broken a window in Mrs. Allen's house.
sentences.chinese: 妈妈，他说，波比打碎了艾伦太太家的窗玻璃。

sentences.english: But today, Bob suddenly felt kike a cup of grape wine.
sentences.chinese: 可是今天，波比突然很想喝一杯葡萄酒。

sentences.english: Jo-Jo and Poppy and Ted and Ziggy and Wantab played party game.
sentences.chinese: 裘裘，波比，泰德和万卡恩一起做生日游戏。

sentences.english: Billy and Bobby were brothers, and they often had fights with each other.
sentences.chinese: 比利和波比是两兄弟，两人经常打架。

sentences.english: Low IMD and low VSWR provides improved system performance .
sentences.chinese: 低的互调干扰和低的电压驻波比保证了系统的性能。

sentences.english: Mr Appleby does not covet power.
sentences.chinese: 艾波比先生不觊觎权力。
波比打碎了艾伦太太家的窗玻璃。

definition: Ox-Head, one of the two guardians of the underworld in Chinese mythology
(literary) beauty (usually of a maid or concubine)
leech/bloodsucking vermin/vampire (translated European notion)/fig. cruel exploiter, esp. a capitalist exploiting the workers
spring/coil spring (spiral spring used to power clockwork)
Dracula, novel by Bram Stoker/Vlad III, Prince of Wallachia (1431-1476), nicknamed Vlad the Impaler or Dracula
to torture sb using electricity/electrocution (capital punishment)
